contentrichtext.text: {{lowercase}} {{Infobox software | name = xplorer² ultimate | screenshot = | developer = Nikos Bozinis | latest release version = 2.3.0.1 | latest release date = {{start date and age|2013|03|08}}<ref name="web-official-download">{{cite web |url=http://www.zabkat.com/x2down.htm |title=xplorer² Download web page |publisher=zabkat.com |date={{date|7-Jun-09}} |accessdate={{date|2012-10-10}}}}</ref> | platform = [[Microsoft Windows]] | size = 1.87 MB (32 bit), 1.91 MB (64 bit) <ref name="web-official-download" /> | genre = [[File manager]] | license = [[Commercial software|Commercial]] [[proprietary software|proprietary]] | website = [http://www.zabkat.com/ www.zabkat.com] }} {{Infobox software | name = xplorer² pro | screenshot = | developer = Nikos Bozinis | latest release version = 2.2.0.1 | latest release date = {{start date and age|2012|10|06}}<ref name="web-official-download">{{cite web |url=http://www.zabkat.com/x2down.htm |title=xplorer² Download web page |publisher=zabkat.com |date={{date|7-Jun-09}} |accessdate={{date|2012-10-10}}}}</ref> | platform = [[Microsoft Windows]] | size = 1.5 MB (32 bit), 1.6 MB (64 bit) <ref name="web-official-download" /> | genre = [[File manager]] | license = [[Commercial software|Commercial]] [[proprietary software|proprietary]] | website = [http://www.zabkat.com/ www.zabkat.com] }} {{Infobox software | name = xplorer² Lite | screenshot = | developer = Nikos Bozinis | latest release version = 2.1.0.1 | latest release date = {{Start date and age|2012|03|27}}<ref name="web-official-lite" /> | platform = [[Microsoft Windows]] | size = 1.4 MB<ref name="web-official-lite" /> | genre = [[File manager]] | license = [[Freeware]]<ref name="web-official-lite" /> | website = [http://www.zabkat.com/x2lite.htm www.zabkat.com/x2lite.htm] }} '''xplorer²''' (formerly '''2xExplorer''') is a dual-pane [[file manager]] for [[Microsoft Windows]] operating systems, developed by Nikos Bozinis (Nikolaos Achilleos Bozinis). It offers the functionality of [[File manager#Orthodox file managers|orthodox file managers]] through an interface similar to the familiar [[Windows Explorer]]. Some of its features are tabbed file management within each pane, viewing and editing text files, searching for files using arbitrary criteria, the ability to compare and synchronize folders and the ability to perform queued or concurrent copy and move operations with error handling (''robust file transfer'').<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.zabkat.com/x2facts.htm |title=xplorer² Fact Sheet: improved file handling |publisher=zabkat.com |accessdate={{date|2009-11-06}}}}</ref> The file finder module is claimed to be “outclass” from other search tools.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.zabkat.com |title=The home page of xplorer² |publisher=zabkat.com |accessdate={{date|2010-03-29}}}}</ref> Apart from the commercial version of the program, there is also a version which is free for personal and academic use. Three features of the Professional version not present in the Lite version are advanced search (Omni-Finder), full Unicode support and robust transfer.<ref name="web-official-lite">{{cite web |url=http://www.zabkat.com/x2lite.htm |title=xplorer² lite: free windows explorer replacement (file manager) |publisher=zabkat.com |accessdate={{date|2009-11-06}}}}</ref> As of July 2007, an official portable version of the xplorer² pro is available for use from an external storage device only. There already existed an unofficial one of xplorer² lite, repackaged with permission of the author. ==See also== *[[Comparison of file managers]] ==References== <references/> ==External links== *[http://www.zabkat.com/ The home page of xplorer²] *[http://usb.smithtech.us/apps/xplorer2lite.php Unofficial portable version] *[http://www.zabkat.com/x2port.htm Official portable version] *[http://netez.com/bbs/index.php?c=4 xplorer² / 2X Explorer Products Forum] {{File managers}} [[Category:Orthodox file managers]] [[Category:Windows software]] {{windows-software-stub}}
